Game.Name: TV Sports Basketball (Japan)
Game.plot: Overview:TV Sports Basketball is a game in Cinemaware's TV Sports series, which recreates various sports as if they were being broadcasted on television. The camera switches depending on which end of the court the player is in, changing the view so that it faces the hoop. While the ball is in the middle of the court, the game switches to a side view.It uses fictional teams, like the other games in the TV Sports series. The fictional teams featured include: The Outlaws, the Ninjas, the Pirates and the Snipers in the West division, and the Wizards, the Shadows, the Giants and the Zombies in the East division.TV Sports Basketball was released for the PC, Amiga and TurboGrafx-16. Game.Notes: The arena's rockin'. Network cameras are rollin'. It's showtime! Here's ultra-real pro roundball that puts you right on the floor with an awesome on-the-court view and total control. Set your offense. Use your screen to nail a three-pointer. Roll off your pick to hit the jumper. Or post up in the paint and power slam with one second left on the shot clock! Now turn up the heat on defense. Trap and go for the steal! Do it all in the only game for up to five players with action more real than you've ever seen!
